text: Measure for Measure is a play written by William Shakespeare. It may also refer to: *Measure for Measure (album), a 1986 studio album by Australian rock/synthpop band Icehouse *Measure for Measure (film), a 1943 Italian historical drama film directed by Marco Elter *Measure for Measure (1979 film), a 1979 BBC production of the Shakespeare play
title: Measure for Measure (disambiguation)
